other_tests.findings: A&Ox3, pleasant and cooperative, nontoxic, NAD. Abdominal exam revealed soft, nondistended abdomen with very mild epigastric tenderness upon deep palpation. Well-healed lower midline incision without erythema, drainage, or hernia.
Patient is now 6 months post PCI, recommendation to hold Plavix 5 days before surgery and start two days after surgery. Optimal to continue aspirin throughout surgical course.
